layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x96
  RenderBlock {test} at (0,0) size 800x96
    RenderBlock {div} at (0,0) size 800x80
      RenderBlock {q} at (0,0) size 800x16
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 235x16
          text run at (0,0) width 235: "This a:q element should be unstyled."
      RenderBlock {p} at (0,32) size 800x16 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 312x16
          text run at (0,0) width 312: "This paragraph should have a green background."
      RenderBlock {r} at (0,64) size 800x16 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 320x16
          text run at (0,0) width 320: "This b:r element should have a green background."
